amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 as en bloc No. 15: Nos. 369, 370, 371, 372, 373, 374, 376, 377, 378, 379, 380, 381, 383, 384, 385, 387, 388, 389, 390, 391, 392, 393, and 394.
